body:
Aye, in this post you have to list your controls of the game, not the screenshots and stuff like that.
For example, my control system ( the weirdest one, it's really my controls):
Shift (sneak) : Enter
Go forward: Up arrow
Go back: Down arrow
Strafe left: Left arrow
Strafe right: Right arrow
Sprint: Backspace o_o
Jump: Space
Attack: Left click
Place block: Right click
Choose block: Button 3 
Slot 1: Button 4
Slot 2: 2
Slot 3: 3
Slot 4: 4
Slot 5: 5
Slot 6: 6
Slot 7: 7
Slot 8: 8
Slot 9: 9
Drop: Button 5
lol
Go ahead and list yours!

replies.body:
Long story short.. I was a nub who came of Minecraft PE and messed around with my controls so they ended up being...

Sneak: Shift
Foward: W
Back: S
Left: A
Right: D
Attack: Button 2 (Right Click)
Place Block: Button 1 (Left Click)
Pick Block: C 
Drop: Cmd
Sprint: R 
Slots are all default... And yeah.. So I play with opposite clicking controls xD

reply_to.body_tagged: How do you combo me every time with a right click...

replies.body:
My mouse has inverted controls.

Left click is placing blocks/shooting arrows/blocking with the sword etc.
Right click is removing blocks/striking with the sword/hitting etc.

So when someone says "Right click this." I have to left click it.

It's always been more comfortable and normal for me I guess.
replies.body_tagged:
